website_summaries.verdict: A popular pick for a recoil pad with an added perk for shotgun owners and shooters.
pros: Layered padding in the back of the pad adds extra contact surface on the shoulder for better control in addition to recoil protection
Comes with a shotgun shell holder
cons: Shell holder can slide around from the recoil kick when shooting
Does not fit most pistol stocks

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Got a nice Mossberg for Christmas, but it kicks like a mule. The pad that came with it is crap, but after I came back from shooting, my shoulder was a few shades of blue. Got this for it, and it fits like a glove and the pad is a wayyy better shock absorber than what was stock. Also, it's pretty nice to be able to put some shells on it. I'm sure it's still going to kick, but wayyyy less than before. :) Will post a photo as soon as I get a chance. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a single shot 410. It fits great and works pretty good. I know a 410 should not kick but on a very very light weight boys stock it did. It kicked more than my 20 gauge and less than the 12 gauge. Now my nephew can shoot it without flinching and he loves the shell holder.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for your shoulder!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I didn't expect to like this as much as I do! My wife bought it for me because I told her my gun kicks like a mule. I put this on and of course it doesn't make the recoil disappear but it definitely makes a difference. Wow! I am buying these for my father as well to add to his rifles. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: Its nice when a product does
customer_reviews.text: Its nice when a product does, what it says it will do. Bought this for my 30-06 and I now use it on my shotgun as well. Makes putting rounds though them enjoyable and saves my shoulder from be sore or bruised. This is a product I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Does what it intends. Fits shotguns and rifles with ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it intends. Fits shotguns and rifles with a hunting-style stock. Don't expect it to fit on most modular / piston stocks.The shell holder slips down with every shot; I'd consider modifying it to anchor it to the stock.

customer_reviews.title: The recoil pad works wonders; however, with my ...
customer_reviews.text: The recoil pad works wonders; however, with my m97, I find that the shell holder tends to slide up the stock towards the grip too much to be of any use. However, I imagine it would fit well on most modern shotgun stocks.

customer_reviews.title: Recoil Pad: Literally Perfect  |  Shell Carrier: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: The rubber butt pad is fantastic and really does make it more comfortable to shoot my Mossberg. The shell holder isn't all that great, though. It doesn't have a good place to rest on the stock and is finicky when inserting and removing shells.
